sentences.en: Condensation will eventually cause the fabric of the building to rot away.
sentences.cn: 冷凝作用将最终使建筑结构腐朽掉。

sentences.en: Dead plants rot and become part of the soil again.
sentences.cn: 枯死的植物腐烂,又成为土壤的一部分.

sentences.en: Investigations had revealed extensive rot in the beams under the ground floor.
sentences.cn: 调查发现一层地下的横梁大面积腐烂。

sentences.en: Much rain will make the fruit rot.
sentences.cn: 这么多雨会使水果腐烂.

sentences.en: Oil and grease will rot the rubber of the tyre.
sentences.cn: 油污会腐蚀轮胎的橡胶.

sentences.en: Rot in the tree trunk caused the tree to fall.
sentences.cn: 树干的腐烂导致树倒了.

sentences.en: Rot is eating away the interior of the house.
sentences.cn: 房子内部正逐渐受到侵蚀。

sentences.en: The house was riddled with dry rot.
sentences.cn: 屋子因木材干腐而变得千疮百孔。

sentences.en: The prisoner is left to rot in the jail.
sentences.cn: 这个囚徒被投入监狱任凭他渐渐消瘦下去.

sentences.en: The trees were cut and left to rot .
The trees were in bad shape from dry rot.
sentences.cn: 树木得了干腐病，状况堪忧。

sentences.en: We were not in the least worried about the possibility that sweets could rot the teeth.
sentences.cn: 我们以前完全不担心吃糖果有可能会蛀牙。

sentences.en: What a load of pompous, pseudo-intellectual rot.
sentences.cn: 真是自命不凡的伪知识分子的一派胡言！

sentences.en: wood that is soft with rot

words.tran_cn: 腐败，腐坏之（rot的现在分词形式）；深蚀刻
（表示厌恶、蔑视、烦恼等）胡说；糟了
[植保]使腐烂；[木]使腐朽；使堕落

trans.tran_cn: （表示厌恶、蔑视、烦恼等）胡说；糟了

trans.tran_en: the natural process of decaying, or the part of something that has decayed
to decay by a gradual natural process, or to make something do this
to decay by a gradual natural process, or to make something do this
to decay by a gradual natural process, or to make something do this
